content:
Dan Augulis' ICS 1C HW 3

Personal Information

Name:Dan Augulis
E-mail: easu1619@ea.oac.uci.edu
Major: Social Science

My Interesting Finds and Questions

Three neat Web finds:
  1. I learned how to find the schedule of classes for the next quarter without having to wait for the printed scheduule to come out. Making my life a little more organized.
  2. I discovered how, while in lab, how to catch up on all of the latest sports information and scores.
  3. The web helped me to find out who the Meher Baba was and how to send and receive mind mail. Not to mention all of the holistic cures I found.

Questions I can now answer
  1. How does the internet help a college student?
  2. What new technology will enhance the users experience on the web?
  3. Who's being impeached in Romania?
  4. Where do you snowboard in Scotland?
  5. How can I prevent being lost at sea?
  1. How does the internet help a college student?
    It helps in any way that the internet helps anyone in the world, it can help the college student. It may just be the most useful tool that the majority of University students don't use. It can help you to accomplish things at your own University (especially Anteaters) more efficiently. It can be a replacement for all of the printed information you dare to collect. It also can be an information and entertainment center helping your brain to use and process all the information you care to look for. Through browsing the web students can meet people, discover things, and learn, all at the same time.

    Return to list of questions.

  2. What new technology will enhance the users experience on the web?
    As the world wide web expands and more and more people begin to browse and add their own information to it, the web will become a more important and useful tool to them. New companies will put their time and efforts into making the time spent on the web more efficient and productive. Multimedia, new audio and video technology will make the web an increasingly integral part of people's lives, while making the internet experience more entertaining and productive.

    Return to list of questions.

  3. Who's being impeached in Romania?
    The international political system has been greatly altered since the fall of the Iron Curtain in 1989. Newly independent countries are scrambling to better their economic and political situation. These new countries are places of intense focus for other Western countries. Long inaccessible they are now key areas for
